# Seizcord

My discord server : https://discord.gg/wyUuYr9DEN

Made by uhq.s







#   USING

Seizcord is a simple library using discord 


```python
import seizcord

cli = seizcord.Client(token='YOUR ACCOUNT TOKEN')


cli.SendMessage(message='WORK?',userid=useid, channelid=channelid)

```
